channel.title: [project] ==The=3=Cities=LFP==
channel.description:
Hello i feel that i have got use to Java and the posibilties and have decided to start a brand new kind of server range.
[u][b]The Idea[/b][/u] We have the 3 cities on the East side of the map (Varrock, Falador, Lumbridge). There are the 3 bases. Now when a new player logs in they are apointed a city and a cape. Lumbridge = Guthix Varrock = Zammorak Falador = Saradomin
Ok the next bit. Each city would be a safe zone, (i have drawn up which bits will be safe zones) but everywhere else is a player killing area aka 'the wild'. In each city it will have personalized shops with different names e.g Lumbridge = lumbridge general store. There shall also be in each city the usual bank and also a training area (up to asigned person where). If you have any other questions or suggestions on the idea just post it.
Ok next the images. [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/9131/varrockjpegmj0.jpg[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7752/lumbridgejpegyg4.jpg[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8160/faladorjpegew1.jpg[/img] -NOTE- The RED boxes are a rough guideline for the safe zones.
OTHER posibilities == Have shops in cities to only allow people from that city to access == If you die the cape of your city is still on your back (can't remove) == Can't attack people with same cape
Ok thats is all of plans. I am looking for able people to help on this. HERE are the following jobs:: City safe zoneing (one for each city) - - - NPC and Shop adding (possibly 2 per city) - - - - - - Cape stays on player and can't remove - Maybe Extras (Teleports.. Spawns) - - -
[b][i][u]NEW JUST THOUGHT OF IT![/u][/i][/b] We need a code so when you log in you go to one of the 3 (wether it be random or equal)(equal is better)
[size=20pt]Ok if anyone likes the idea, wants to help or has suggestions please post i would love feedback---Applying to do extras help you must state your ideas---[/size]

item.title: [project] ==The=3=Cities=LFP==
item.dc:creator: @Ice Ice
item.description:
@Ice wrote:

Hi i’m Ice,
I’m very good at coding, but i’m not sure this is the thing most people would like to help code. Top coders want a challenge. They want something they haven’t coded before. This is a basic. People can do this within a day or two. I’m sorry but i’m not sure if i’m going to help.

Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: [project] ==The=3=Cities=LFP==
item.dc:creator: @monster666 monster666
item.description:
@monster666 wrote:

Hello i feel that i have got use to Java and the posibilties and have decided to start a brand new kind of server range.

The Idea
We have the 3 cities on the East side of the map (Varrock, Falador, Lumbridge). There are the 3 bases. Now when a new player logs in they are apointed a city and a cape.
Lumbridge = Guthix
Varrock = Zammorak
Falador = Saradomin

Ok the next bit. Each city would be a safe zone, (i have drawn up which bits will be safe zones) but everywhere else is a player killing area aka ‘the wild’. In each city it will have personalized shops with different names e.g Lumbridge = lumbridge general store. There shall also be in each city the usual bank and also a training area (up to asigned person where). If you have any other questions or suggestions on the idea just post it.

Ok next the images.



-NOTE- The RED boxes are a rough guideline for the safe zones.

OTHER posibilities
== Have shops in cities to only allow people from that city to access
== If you die the cape of your city is still on your back (can’t remove)
== Can’t attack people with same cape

Ok thats is all of plans. I am looking for able people to help on this. HERE are the following jobs::
City safe zoneing (one for each city)

NPC and Shop adding (possibly 2 per city)

Cape stays on player and can’t remove

Maybe Extras (Teleports… Spawns)

NEW JUST THOUGHT OF IT!
We need a code so when you log in you go to one of the 3 (wether it be random or equal)(equal is better)

[size=20pt]Ok if anyone likes the idea, wants to help or has suggestions please post i would love feedback—Applying to do extras help you must state your ideas—[/size]

Read full topic
